column1: Funeral services will be 10:00 a.m. Monday
column3: at St. John United Church of Christ in Florence with Pastors Larry Matson and Larry Gallamore sp? officiating. Interment will be in the St. John UCC Cemetery in Florence.  The family will receive friends from 4:00-6:00 p.m. Sunday
column5: at the Scrivner-Morrow Funeral Home in Stover.
